committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Financial Institutions Supervision, Regulation and Insurance

official_title: To amend the Financial Institutions Reform, Recovery and Enforcement Act of 1989 for the purpose of protecting residential tenants from unnecessary eviction by the Resolution Trust Corporation.

summary.text: Amends the Financial Institutions Reform, Recovery and Enforcement Act of 1989 to provide that a conservator or receiver of any insured depository institution shall not disaffirm or repudiate residential contracts or leases that are required by State law.

titles.title: To amend the Financial Institutions Reform, Recovery and Enforcement Act of 1989 for the purpose of protecting residential tenants from unnecessary eviction by the Resolution Trust Corporation.
